summary: Senior Frontend Developer with 7+ years of expertise in implementing pixel-perfect UI/UX designs using React, TypeScript, and modern CSS methodologies. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams to deliver responsive, accessible web applications with performance-optimized code. Passionate about bridging design and development through component-driven architecture.

responsibilities: Led UI architecture redesign for enterprise SaaS platform, improving Lighthouse performance scores by 42%
Implemented design system with TypeScript and styled-components, reducing development time by 30%
Mentored 4 junior developers in React best practices and accessibility standards compliance
Collaborated with UX team to prototype complex data visualization features using D3.js

responsibilities: Developed responsive customer portal used by 500k+ users with React and Material-UI
Integrated REST APIs with TypeScript interfaces, reducing runtime errors by 65%
Optimized CSS delivery through critical CSS extraction and CSS-in-JS implementation
Implemented WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across 15+ core application flows
